summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department; authorizing the sale and removal of certain timber in the SE 1/4 SE 1/4 Section 21, SW 1/4 SW 14 Section 22, NW 1/4 NW 1/4 Section 27, NE 1/4 NE 1/4 Section 28, NE 1/4, NE 1/4 SE 1/4 Section 34; and S 1/2 SW 1/4 Section 26 and NE 1/4 NW 1/4 Section 35, all in Township 22 North, Range 9 East, W.M., in the Cedar River Watershed under contract with the Mountain Tree Farm Company.
